# CKAccountStatus.noAccount

**Case**

The device doesn’t have an iCloud account.

## Declaration

```swift
case noAccount
```

## Account Statuses

- **CKAccountStatus.available**: The user’s iCloud account is available.
- **CKAccountStatus.couldNotDetermine**: CloudKit can’t determine the status of the user’s iCloud account.
- **CKAccountStatus.restricted**: The system denies access to the user’s iCloud account.
- **CKAccountStatus.temporarilyUnavailable**: The user’s iCloud account is temporarily unavailable.
